page.title: 07Calbourne Village Shops
page.content: The{VILLAGE SHOP}is a small, privately owned, general groceries and newspaper store. It also has an off Licence. The shop serves a wide area as most people have transport. The Village { {SUB POST OFFICE}pays Pensions and Family Allowances, Savings Bank and Giro account; it also sells Telephone and Television stamps and car licence stamps. Water rates and electricity bills can also be paid through the Post Office Giro Bank. The{PETROL {STATION}sells Petrol, Oil and car accessories. Motor bikes are sold and repaired on the premises. Motor cycling clothing and accessories are also available. There is a{GARAGE} doing repair and maintainance and dealing in second hand cars. The local Public House{SUN INN}has a large car Park and Tea Gardens. Bar snacks and hot meals can be obtained.
